title: Arizona Cardinals vs. Pittsburgh Steelers final injury reoprt
text:
Arizona Cardinals vs. Pittsburgh Steelers final injury reoprt The Cardinals have released their final injury report in advance of Sunday's game with the Steelers. Post to Facebook Arizona Cardinals vs. Pittsburgh Steelers final injury reoprt The Cardinals have released their final injury report in advance of Sunday's game with the Steelers.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1RNeWeC   Join the Conversation To   Arizona Cardinals vs. Pittsburgh Steelers final injury reoprt Robby Baker , 12 Sports 3:02 p.m. MST October 16, 2015 The Cardinals have released their final injury report in advance of Sunday's game with the Steelers. Oct 4, 2015; Glendale, AZ, USA; Arizona Cardinals guard Mike Iupati (76) looks on prior to the snap during the second half against the St. Louis Rams at University of Phoenix Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Matt Kartozian-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Matt Kartozian-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Arizona Cardinals have released their final injury report before the team takes on the Pittsburgh Steelers. 
It's a rather long list, with the only player for sure out being Alex Okefor. With Okefor out, the newly signed Dwight Freeney should see some playing time. 
Here's the full list:
